title: Has anyone had a supernatural experience like this? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was in 11th class, I was going on a school trip to mysore. My first time away from the family. We took accommodation at a YMCA hostel. I was sharing the room with 6 people and there were 3 double decker beds(the ones with no side railing). I was sleeping in the upper deck in one of those. I was sleeping soundly, just then I felt someone tap my shoulder twice. Suddenly I was wide awake and realized that I was on the edge of the bed and had I moved even an inch further I would have fallen on a steel chair that was right below me and that might have caused some serious injury to my back. I had no explanation to this incident.
No.And your experience wasn't paranormal either.Just a mixture of suggestion, coincidence and you being in a influetiable mood.
